description: Joint Programme on Comprehensive Community Services to Improve Human Security for the Rural Disadvantaged Populations in Mongolia

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1.   Enhance the capacity of the selected micro and small entrepreneurs/producers in the target aimags to be engaged in income-generating activities and/or start their own businesses
2.  Improve the quality of locally available business support services through the chamber network
3.  Improve the local coordination among existing business development/support services in the target aimags
subproject.title: Services to Ethnic Minority

title: JP on Community Services to improve Human Security
